com.compositesw.common

Class CompositeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.compositesw.common.CompositeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeSecurityException

    public class CompositeException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This exception is a super class of all exceptions thrown by CDMS. Each CDMS domain can create its own exception object that is inherited from this class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean isPrintStackTrace()
        This method should be over-rided for any CompositeException that never prints its stack trace.
        Returns:
        true if the stack trace is to be printed in the log. false otherwise
